metadata.title: A Guide to the Archival and Manuscript Collection of the
metadata.creator: Ukrainian Academy of Arts and Sciences in the United States
Boshyk, Yuri
Canadian Institute of Ukrainian Studies
metadata.note: The Ukrainian Academy of Arts and Sciences in the United States, New York City, houses the most comprehensive and important archival and manuscript collection on Ukrainians outside Ukraine. This report provides scholars and researchers with a detailed description of the Academy's valuable primary source materials. Besides cataloguing the Academy's collection, the researchers also prepared an inventory of materials relating to Ukraine and Ukrainians in repositories in the New York City area, including Connecticut, New Jersey and Philadelphia.
metadata.publisher: Edmonton, Alta. : Canadian Institute of Ukrainian Studies, University of Alberta
